ConverterSection.description: Compress a MOV file to reduce file size and share videos without reducing quality with Internxt.

howToConvert.title: How to compress a MOV file
howToConvert.description: To compress a MOV file, follow these steps:

steps.description: Upload your MOV file: drag and drop your file into the area above, or upload it from your device to start the conversion.

howToConvert.outro: With this tool, you can compress a MOV file for free for multiple files whenever you need. All files are secured with encrypted uploads to guarantee the privacy of your videos.

whyConvert.title: Why you may need to compress a MOV file
whyConvert.intro: Unfortunately, sending large video files online can be difficult due to upload limits from email, file sharing, or cloud storage services. By using Internxt to compress a MOV file, you get a secure, free tool that, once complete, allows you to:
bullets: Upload videos faster and save bandwidth
whyConvert.outro: All your files are encrypted during the upload and compression process to keep your videos private, so you can compress, store, and share your files in confidence with Internxt.

CtaSection.title: Internxt
CtaSection.description: A secure platform to compress, store, and share MOV files
